plot: The robots meet The Physician, an "intergalactic buttinsky" who travels in a small blue box while trapped in a binary star system that is destroying its inner planets.
plot_en: The robots meet The Physician, an "intergalactic buttinsky" who travels in a small blue box while trapped in a binary star system that is destroying its inner planets.

title: Robot Astronomy Talk Show
